title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of establishments is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of establishments in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of establishments is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
There is a difference of 491.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
The Number of establishments is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
Month Quebec has the second highest value for Number of establishments.
The difference of Number of establishments between the highest and lowest Month is 491.0.
Number of establishments at Month Ontario is 492.0 , second place is Quebec at 267.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 206.0.
The Number of establishments has decreased over the past 13 Months.
Month Northwest Territories, and Nunavut have a similar Number of establishments that is 19.0.
The highest value 492.0 at Ontario is almost 4.36 times larger than the average value 112.77.
